import sys

sand_glass_time, time_elapsed = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

if time_elapsed >= sand_glass_time:
    time_elapsed %= sand_glass_time
    time_elapsed = sand_glass_time - time_elapsed

print(sand_glass_time - time_elapsed)

x,t = map(int,input().split())
print(x-t if x-t>0 else 0)

x, t = map(int, input().split())
print(x - t)
